metadata.title: Tuesday, 15th September, 2020
metadata.session: FIFTH SESSION OF THE TWELFTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Mines and Minerals Development
parts: (a) why Shafts 18 and 28 at the Luanshya Copper Mines were not operational as of July, 2020; and
(b) when operations will resume.
(a) when Mitete District will be connected to the national electricity grid; and
(b) what has caused the delay in connecting the District.
(a) when the upgrading of the following informal settlements in Bwana Mkubwa Parliamentary Constituency will commence:
(i) Kaloko; (ii) Old Regiment; (iii) Makenzie; (iv) Kantolomba;
(v) Mwenye; (vi) Mwange A; (vii) Mwange B; and (viii) Zambia Compound; and
(b) what the time frame for the completion of the exercise is.
(a) whether the Government has any plans to upgrade the Lewanika General Hospital in Mongu District to a third level hospital;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented;
(c) what the total cost of the exercise is; and
(d) what the estimated time frame for the completion of the exercise is.
(a) whether there were any women empowerment programmes in Kabompo Parliamentary Constituency funded by the Government from 2017 to  2019;
(b) if so, what the programmes are; and
(c) how much money was disbursed for each programme.
(a) when police officers will be deployed to Senga Police Post in Senga Hill Parliamentary Constituency;
(b) what the cause of the delay in deploying the staff is; and
(c) whether the Government has any plans to construct additional staff houses at the Police Post.
(a) whether the Government has any plans to declare Nangoma a district; and
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented.

questions.minister: Minister of Chiefs and Traditional Affairs
parts: (a) when the construction  of palaces for the following Chiefs in Mkushi North Parliamentary Constituency will commence:
(i) Chitina; (ii) Mulungwe; and (iii) Shaibila;
(b) what the cause of the delay in commencing the project is; and
(c) what the time frame for the completion of each project is.
(a) when the construction of ten (10) health posts in Gwembe Parliamentary Constituency, under the 650 Health Posts Project, will commence;
(b) what the cause of the delay in commencing the project is; and
(c) who the contractor for the project is.
(a) whether the Government has any plans to restock fish in the Lufubu River in Ngabwe District;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented;
(c) what the estimated cost of the exercise is; and
(d) what the time frame for the completion of the exercise is. QUESTIONS FOR WRITTEN ANSWER W1.  Ms Tambatamba (Kasempa)   -   to ask the Minister of Mines and Minerals Development:
(a) how many mining licences in the following categories were issued in Kasempa District from 2012 to 2019, year by year:
(i) small scale prospecting licences; (ii) large scale prospecting licences; (iii) small scale mining licences; and (iv) large scale mining licences;
(b) for which minerals the prospecting licences were issued;
(c) how many licences of each category are held by foreign investors;
(d) how many licences of each category were active as of December, 2019; and
(e) how much revenue, on average, was collected as licence fees from 2014 to 2019, year by year. W2.  Mrs M L Phiri (Chilanga)   -   to ask the Minister of Agriculture:
(a) how many irrigation schemes were developed under the Irrigation Development Master Plan, as of December, 2019, province by province;
(b) what the challenges of implementing the Plan are;
(c) what measures the Government is taking to address the challenges;
(d) whether there are any private companies developing large scale irrigation schemes; and

(e) if so, what the names of the companies are, province by province. NOTICE OF MOTION Ms Mwape Thanks - His Excellency the President’s Address: That the thanks of this Assembly be recorded for the exposition of public policy contained in His Excellency the President’s Address. ___________________________
